blogPost.title: What is the future of human life in space? Answer by @awaisahmedna, Founder and CEO @PixxelSpace. https://t.co/UYFsPOkjsX https://t.co/ExuWTiqm3K
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 人類の宇宙での生活はどうなるのでしょうか？Answer by @awaisahmedna, Founder and CEO @PixxelSpace. https://t.co/UYFsPOkjsX https://t.co/ExuWTiqm3K
人类在太空生活的未来是什么？回答者：@awaisahmedna，创始人兼CEO @PixxelSpace。https://t.co/UYFsPOkjsX https://t.co/ExuWTiqm3K
人類在太空生活的未來是什麼？回答者：@awaisahmedna，創始人兼CEO @PixxelSpace。https://t.co/UYFsPOkjsX https://t.co/ExuWTiqm3K

previous.title: What are some best practices for leading a happier life in general? Answer by @NeilPasricha, NY Times Bestselling Author of "The Happiness Equation" & "The Book of Awesome". https://t.co/Nbwm1rTI2M https://t.co/ne3WV3QXjZ

localize.full_text: 一般的に、より幸せな人生を送るためのベストプラクティスとは何でしょうか？NYタイムズ紙のベストセラー『幸せの方程式』と『驚異の書』の著者、@NeilPasricha氏による回答です。 https://t.co/Nbwm1rTI2M https://t.co/ne3WV3QXjZ
在一般情况下，有哪些最佳做法可以使生活更快乐？回答者：@尼尔-帕斯里夏，《纽约时报》畅销书作者，《幸福方程式》& 《了不起的书》。https://t.co/Nbwm1rTI2M https://t.co/ne3WV3QXjZ
在一般情況下，有哪些最佳做法可以使生活更快樂？回答者：@尼爾-帕斯里夏，《紐約時報》暢銷書作者，《幸福方程式》& 《了不起的書》。https://t.co/Nbwm1rTI2M https://t.co/ne3WV3QXjZ

next.title: How can I be a quick thinker during a conversation? Answer by Laurie Gerber, Head Coach @HGLifeCoaching. https://t.co/DHIf8z8jPV https://t.co/aRM7zOk41V

localize.full_text: 会話中に頭の回転が速い人になるには？Answer by Laurie Gerber, Head Coach @HGLifeCoaching. https://t.co/DHIf8z8jPV https://t.co/aRM7zOk41V
怎样才能在谈话中做到思维敏捷？回答者：Laurie Gerber，总教练 @HGL LifeCoaching. https://t.co/DHIf8z8jPV https://t.co/aRM7zOk41V
怎樣才能在談話中做到思維敏捷？回答者：Laurie Gerber，總教練 @HGL LifeCoaching. https://t.co/DHIf8z8jPV https://t.co/aRM7zOk41V
